            About Me
            I am a doctoral student in the School of Criminal Justice
            at the University of Cincinnati. My research focuses on
            policing and the geographic concentration of crime. I enjoy
            using R and ArcGIS to
            analyze large amounts of data and identify high crime
            places. My recent work has been featured in Crime and
            Delinquency and Police Practice and
            Research.
            
            
            Education
            University of Cincinnati | Cincinnati,
            OH
            Ph.D. in Criminal Justice | August 2019 - Present
            Southern Illinois University Carbondale
            | Carbondale, IL
            M.A. in Criminology & Criminal Justice | August 2018
            - May 2019
            B.A. in Criminology & Criminal Justice | August 2016
            - May 2018
            
            
            Experience
            University of Cincinnati | Cincinnati,
            OH
            Digital Futures Fellow | August 2022 - Present
            Graduate Research Assistant | August 2019 - July 2022

              About Me

              Justice at the University of Cincinnati. My research

              crime. I enjoy using R and

              and identify high crime places. My recent work has been
